name: Decorator Generator
description: Generates a functional decorator for the generic UI.

configStructure.name: decoratorName
configStructure.regexMessage: No spaces and special characters allowed. This value is used as the name of the generated decorator class.
configStructure.description: Unique name for the decorator ("Decorator" will be appended).

configStructure.name: inherit
configStructure.description: Generates a decorator that inherits from the ModelEditor.
